about_the_game:
💥 Short Description:

Mercenary Battlegrounds is an exciting strategy game that combines elements of tower defense, auto-battler and strategy. Create defensive towers and improve them to effectively resist enemies. Develop different strategies and choose the most suitable towers to face different types of enemies. Exciting waves of enemies and the possibility to fight with other players in multiplayer mode are waiting for you.

🌌 Plot Basis:

In the distant future, two galaxies were slowly approaching each other, and scientific predictions predicted that their merger could lead to catastrophic consequences. When the galaxies finally collided, incredible phenomena began to occur in the universe: blinding flares, gravitational anomalies, gamma rays, and a host of other phenomena. This was the beginning of the Great Movement.
Many races inhabiting the universe decided to travel to a new galaxy to explore and find a new home. However, many races could not share the interests of others for certain planets, and wars for wealth, dominance, and influence began.
In this turmoil, a clan of space mercenaries formed, willing to join various races for a fee and participate in battlefield battles. The mercenaries consisted of various races and came from all corners of the universe to a new galaxy called the Outcast Galaxy.

🪐 Description of Planets:

🟢 Equory:

(Planet Equory, where plants have joined together to create incredible wonders)
- Primary resource mined: Equorium
The surface of Equorium resembles a garden full of blooming fantasy plants and trees. There are also tall towers and "buildings" made of plants that are inherently alive and intelligent, glowing with bright lights and painted in different colors. Often their appearance is deceptive, some of these creatures are quite cunning and aggressive, they lure their prey with their beauty and then mercilessly devour it. There are many gravitational anomalies on Equori, which allow towers and islets with plants to float in the air forming "air castles" and incredible architecture.
Remarkable fact: there is absolutely no water on this planet, and the sap and vapors secreted by plants are toxic and deadly to virtually any race living outside of this planet.

✨Units (Towers):

In Mercenary Battlegrounds, you will be able to choose from a wide arsenal of turrets to develop your strategy. In addition, you'll be able to hire different mercenaries, each with their own unique characteristics, damage types, and defenses. Create the most effective combination to deal with the growing strength of your opponents and overpower other players.

🌟 Multiplayer mode:

In this exciting world, not only the planets are full of dangers, but also the battle arenas. In multiplayer mode, you can test your strategies and management skills in battles with other players. Single player and team battles will test your tactical strength. Prove your superiority and grab the top of the leaderboards.

🚀 Are you ready to become the leader of a clan of space mercenaries and protect your base from enemies? Immerse yourself in the exciting world of Mercenary Battlegrounds and demonstrate your skills in strategic battle! 💪😎

name: Mercenary Battlegrounds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 / AMD R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core from Intel or AMD at 2.8GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Mercenary Battlegrounds is an exciting strategy game where you have to fight and defend your base against waves of enemy forces. Immerse yourself in a fantasy world and enjoy a unique combination of tower defense, auto-battler and strategic game mechanics.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
